sectionproductlist_synchronizedsection_h.message: The products published in this section will be automatically added to this list and vice versa.

sectionproductlist_synchronizedsection_p.message: Select the section to be synchronized with

variantgroup_add_axis_value.message: Add a value to this axis:

variantgroup_axe_no_url.message: Does not have a product sheet

variantgroup_axe_has_url.message: Has a product sheet by axis value

variantgroup_product_does_not_exist_yet.message:
This product does not yet exist.

It will be created after you have saved the changes with the Save button below.

variantgroup_products_will_be_created_wh.message: The corresponding variants to the selected combinations will be created only after saving this form.

variantgroup_help_tip.message:
Each axis declination is presented in a column and displays all possible values. The selected values, i.e. for which the product sheets are generated, appear in green. You can navigate in the following areas only when a value is selected on an axis.

What to do here?

Add a product variant

Click on to select this value and create the corresponding product sheets.

Delete variations for the product

click on to delete this value and thus the corresponding product sheets.

Add/remove possible axes values

click on in the header of each axis to configure it: you can remove values with the button and add through the input field at the bottom of the column corresponding to the axis.

variantgroup_jobs_infos.message: Variants configuration is not accessible at the moment. Please wait a few minutes.

productlist_productsortorder_help.message: Property used to sort the products in the list. This sorting excludes highlighted products.

productlist_products_picker_title.message: select products to add to the category

productlistitem_condition_help.message: Start by choosing a condition to view and manage the products list.

sectionproductlist_create.message: add a products list synced with a section

product_list_contextual_urls.message: products details in the current section

crosssellingproductlist_list_already_exi.message: a $TYPE$ list already exists for the product $PRODUCT$

productlist_productlist_picker_title.message: select list where to add the product

product_visuals_help.message: First visual of the list will be considered to be the product sheet main visual.

product_shippedin_help.message: Delivery time displayed on web site.

product_minorderquantity_help.message: Minimum quantity of this product that can be ordered.

product_maxorderquantity_help.message: Maximum quantity of this product that can be ordered.

product_condition_help.message: Choose a condition first to display and manage categories list.

product_publicationsections_help.message: Product must be published in at least one section by web site where it is displayed. If it is published in several sections of a site, its canonical section for this site will be the first. To specialize the URL of a product in a given section, you must publish it explicitly in this section.

product_price_section_help.message:
Product prices depend on web shop and pricing area. The same product that appears in several web shops or pricing areas can have several basic prices, in addition to any promotional prices.

Start by choosing a web shop and a pricing zone to display and manage prices.

product_product_list_section_help.message: Lists allow to publish the products in web site's sections.

product_categorizable_help.message: This property allows you to specify whether this product can be displayed in lists of products.

remove_products_from_list.message: Remove selected products from the list.

remove_product_from_list.message: Remove this product from the selected lists.

add_product_in_list.message: add this product to a list

remove_highlight_products.message: No longer highlight the selected products.

product_add_to_selected_lists.message: Add the product $PRODUCT$ to the selected lists

attribute_description_help.message: Attribute description displayed on the web site.

product_is_available_in_following_lists.message: The product $PRODUCTLINK$ is available in the lists of products below.

product_is_available_in_no_lists.message: The product $PRODUCTLINK$ isn't currently available in any list.

product_productlists_explanation.message: If you want the product to be highlighted in a list, set Highlighted as Yes. Highlighted products will be listed first and you will be able to choose their display order, while other products (non-highlighted) will be listed in alphabetical order, after highlighted products.

product_choose_lists_message.message: Select products lists through the selector below.

productlist_reorder_items.message: Manage and reorder this products list

product_cross_selling_list_help.message: You can manage related products lists here. For example, you can create a list of accessories, as well as a list of upsells, that will show your customers to products of interest.
